law.catch_line: It is a violation of this subtitle for a viatical settlement broker or viatical settlement provider ...

text.section:
Any copies of certification or independent evidence required under subsection (b) of this section shall be:
submitted to the insurer when the viatical settlement provider submits a request to the insurer for verification of coverage; and
accompanied by a letter of attestation from the viatical settlement provider that the copies of certification or independent evidence required under subsection (b) of this section are true and correct copies of the documents received by the viatical settlement provider.
